attributes.action: Change the law so people with learning disabilities or autism can’t be detained
attributes.additional_details: People with learning disabilities or autism should have bespoke packages of support to achieve a better outcome rather than being locked away in these institutions. Following the Winterbourne Review the Government promised to move all those with learning disabilities and/or autism inappropriately placed in such institutions into community care. We should go further and stop the detention of such people entirely.
attributes.background: I would like to put an end to people with learning disabilities or autism being detained in hospital under the Mental Health Act.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
